sys_ui_macro.name: provision_applications
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	
	<script>
		function openApplicationModal(){
			
			var modalDialog = new GlideModal("x_wcs_ctrx_auto_sv_application_modal");
			modalDialog.setTitle("Application");
			//modalDialog.setPreference("More info");
			modalDialog.setSize(700, 800);
			modalDialog.render();
		
		}
		
	</script>
	
	<body>
		<button onclick="openApplicationModal()" class="btn btn-md btn-primary">Add Applications</button>
	</body>
	
</j:jelly>
